contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 19, 2000 D Brass In Concert
Brass In Concert 0 Entertainments Contest Brass In Concert brass-in-concert
Spennymoor Leisure Centre, County Durham Awards Dougie Grieve Memorial Trophy: Youngest Player - Mathew Neville (Todmorden Old) Principal Cornetist Winner: Northern Development - Kirsty Abbott (Sellers) Principal Euphonium: Thomas Bulmer Memorial Trophy - Glyn Williams (Foden) Own Choice March: Musicians Union Trophy - Around the World (Besses) Solo Winner: MSF trophy - Peter Smith (Bass Player, Todmorden Old, 16yrs) Entertainment & Presentation awarded by DCWM: Fodens Cyril Beere Memorial Trophy: Best new arrangement or composition - Grimethorpe, Manchester Tale (Andrew Duncan) Quality of performance: Durham County Council - Grimethorpe Peter Hartley Memorial Trophy: Winning Conductor - Ray Farr (Foden) Frank Johnson Memorial Trophy: Neatest package of musical scores & Notes - Ever Ready
July 19, 2009, 12:29 p.m. March 28, 2012, 2:27 p.m.
1 Fodens Band Ray Farr
2 Leyland Band Richard Evans
3 Grimethorpe Colliery Band Garry Cutt
4 Stavanger Brass Band Frank Renton
5 Ransome Band Russell Gray
